desc: Is all life just an elaborate calculation? I don't know . . .
I write c/java/matlab programs for launch on supercomputers
I like to convert abstract ideas into quantitative models
I want to be able to parallelize all of my work MapReduce style
my thesis centered around building theories of polymer networks
I'm interested in creating materials that self-organize to do useful
I'd like to program biological systems to carry out useful functions
when the world's energy consumption is equal to that incident from the sun
I work on hobby projects that bring renewable technology into the home
I'm still a farm boy at heart
I write a blog called tech vivo about synthetic biology and biological modeling
I've built an online course for teaching computational modeling
I volunteer at the @rtifice youth hackerspace on the southside of Chicago
